songs.title: Say My Name (Live)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus:]
Say my name, say my name
When no one is around you
Say baby I love you
If you ain't runnin' game

Say my name, say my name
You actin' kinda shady
Ain't callin' me baby
Why the sudden change

Repeat

[Verse:]
Any utha day
I would call, you would say
Baby how's ya day
But today it ain't the same
Every utha word
Is uh huh, yea ok
Could it be that you
Are at the crib with anutha lad-ay

If you took it there
First of all let me say
I am not the one
To sit around and be played
Baby why, why you gots to lie
I'm all up in yo game
Boy, you betta say my name (What?)

[Bridge:]
I know you say that I'm assumin' things
B: Sumthins goin' down that's the way it seems
Shouldn't be no reaon why you're actin' strange
B: If nobody's holdin' you back from meee
I know how you usually do
B: You would say everything to me times 2
Why don't you just tell the truth
B: If somebody's there then tell me who...

Say my name
Just ay my, just say my, just say my name
Say my, say my, say my name
Boy, say my name
Hey, say

B: Say Beyonce
Beyonce
B: Say Beyonce, sang it ya'll
Beyonce
B: Say Beyonce-e-e
Beyonce
B: Say Beyonce

Say-ay-ay-ay-ay-ay-ay-ay
